sqlMap.select:
SELECT VEHICLE_VIN, VEHICLE_ID, VEHICLE_LN, ORGANIZATION_ID, ENTERPRISE_ID, SHORT_ALLNAME, VEHICLE_CODE, SHORT_NAME, ROUTE_ID FROM CLW_JC_CLEN_VI WHERE ORGANIZATION_ID in (select enterprise_id from clw_jc_enterprise_vi where left_num >= (select left_num from clw_jc_enterprise_vi where enterprise_id = #organization_id#) and right_num <=(select right_num from clw_jc_enterprise_vi where enterprise_id = #organization_id#)
)
VEHICLE_VIN like '%' || #vehicle_vin# ||'%' escape '\'
ORDER BY MODIFY_TIME DESC

SELECT VEHICLE_VIN, VEHICLE_ID, VEHICLE_LN, ORGANIZATION_ID, ENTERPRISE_ID, SHORT_ALLNAME, VEHICLE_CODE, SHORT_NAME, ROUTE_ID FROM CLW_JC_CLEN_VI WHERE user_id =#userID#
VEHICLE_VIN like '%' || #vehicle_vin# ||'%' escape '\'
ORDER BY MODIFY_TIME DESC

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM CLW_JC_CLEN_VI WHERE ORGANIZATION_ID in (select enterprise_id from clw_jc_enterprise_vi where left_num >= (select left_num from clw_jc_enterprise_vi where enterprise_id = #organization_id#) and right_num <=(select right_num from clw_jc_enterprise_vi where enterprise_id = #organization_id#)
)
VEHICLE_VIN like '%' || #vehicle_vin# ||'%' escape '\'
upper(VEHICLE_LN) like '%' || upper(#vehicle_ln#) ||'%' escape '\'
VEHICLE_CODE like '%' || #vehicle_code# ||'%' escape '\'

SELECT VEHICLE_VIN, VEHICLE_ID, VEHICLE_LN, ORGANIZATION_ID, ENTERPRISE_ID, SHORT_ALLNAME, VEHICLE_CODE, SHORT_NAME, ROUTE_ID, VEHICLE_NUMBER, ENGINE_NUMBER FROM CLW_JC_CLEN_VI WHERE ORGANIZATION_ID in (select enterprise_id from clw_jc_enterprise_vi where left_num >= (select left_num from clw_jc_enterprise_vi where enterprise_id = #organization_id#) and right_num <=(select right_num from clw_jc_enterprise_vi where enterprise_id = #organization_id#)
)
VEHICLE_VIN like '%' || #vehicle_vin# ||'%' escape '\'
upper(VEHICLE_LN) like '%' || upper(#vehicle_ln#) ||'%' escape '\'
VEHICLE_CODE like '%' || #vehicle_code# ||'%' escape '\'
ORDER BY MODIFY_TIME DESC

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM CLW_JC_CLEN_VI WHERE user_id =#userID#
VEHICLE_VIN like '%' || #vehicle_vin# ||'%' escape '\'
upper(VEHICLE_LN) like '%' || upper(#vehicle_ln#) ||'%' escape '\'
VEHICLE_CODE like '%' || #vehicle_code# ||'%' escape '\'

SELECT VEHICLE_VIN, VEHICLE_ID, VEHICLE_LN, ORGANIZATION_ID, ENTERPRISE_ID, SHORT_ALLNAME, VEHICLE_CODE, SHORT_NAME, ROUTE_ID, VEHICLE_NUMBER, ENGINE_NUMBER FROM CLW_JC_CLEN_VI WHERE user_id =#userID#
VEHICLE_VIN like '%' || #vehicle_vin# ||'%' escape '\'
upper(VEHICLE_LN) like '%' || upper(#vehicle_ln#) ||'%' escape '\'
VEHICLE_CODE like '%' || #vehicle_code# ||'%' escape '\'
ORDER BY MODIFY_TIME DESC
